comment: She did not know the material.  This is an upper level chemistry laboratory, which she was not prepared to teach.  Did not get the majority of graded work back until the day of the lab final, which she did not write.  She never returned emails.  Overall I would not recommend to take her.

I had her for Lab and she was awesome made everything easy to understand! she needs to be teaching 1152 lecture! she is a sweet lady & will assist you if you're confused and makes sure you comprehend it, she will not move on if you are confused like some professors who get frustrated...TAKE HER!
Amazing teacher! Makes everything so understandable. She made me LOVE chemistry, which I never thought would happen!
One of the best professors I've had yet! Very sweet and explains the material thoroughly. I had her for lab, and she always made class interesting.

Loved her, loved her, loved her. She's always out to help. Chemistry is defintely something I'm not good at and she helped alot. It's not the easiest class but if u want a good professor...this one is for u. I made an A.

MICHELLE IS A BLESSING TO HAVE AS A CHEM TEACHER. I HAVEN'T BEEN IN SCHOOL IN YEARS AND DREADED CHEMISTRY. BUT SHE MAKES IS UNDERSTANDABLE AND RELATABLE. SHE WANTS HER STUDENTS TO SUCCEED AND IT SHOWS. I WISH SHE WOULD TEACH IN ALL MY CLASSES. HEHEHE THE CLASS IS CHELLENGING BUT IN A GOOD WAY, IT IS FOR YOU TO SUCCEED AND NOT FAIL. DEFINITELY RECOM
Love her.  Wish she would teach this summer!  Goes beyond what she needs to to help.  She loves to teach and she will make sure you understand everything you need to know.  Take Her whenever you can.

This is a great professor. She should teach more classes. She is clear,concise and most of all cares that you learn the material. Her exams are not easy but this is Chem...study hard and you will do well. She will help in any way she can. TAKE HER CLASS>>>>
I loved Her She is awesome.

I ENJOYED Michelle's class she truly cares about students. She wants you to succedd and learn the material. Attendance isn't mandatory & she gives you the opportunity to earn 200+ points (quizzes, in-class points & an essay (2-3 pages). She gives 4 exams each weighted at 200 pts. Take her class you won't regret it!!! I didn't!!!!

Does everything she can to make sure students understand material. Don't necessarily need the book, just print the notes to study from. She gives a study guide. Get daily points, if you miss a lot, there's extra credit. Test = easy.

Michelle is the best! She's made me actually like chem lab, and understand organic chemistry wayyy better than my lecture professor did. She's nice and down to earth, and knows how to explain chemistry to make it actually make sense, no easy task. I hope she teaches more lecture classes, bc I would take her for every class I could! AMAZING teacher!

Makes lab interesting and fun. Explains things thouroughly and in plain english. Directions and explanations easy to understand. She takes extra time with students so that they understand everything. Great professor!!
